objects.text:
• 5 Star Energy Efficiency
• Whisper-Quiet Comfort (38 dB)
• PM 2.5 Air Purification
• Smart Inverter Technology

product_details.name: Daikin 1.5 Ton 5 Star Inverter Split AC (Copper, PM 2.5 Filter, MTKM50U, White)
product_details.description:
- Brand: DAIKIN.
- Model: MTKM50U.
- Energy Efficiency: 5 star.
- Capacity: 1.5 Tons.
- Annual Energy Consumption: 785.67 Kilowatt Hours Per Year.
- Noise Level: 38 dB.
- Installation Type: Split System.
- Part Number: MTKM50U.
- Form Factor: Mini-Split.
- Special Features: Inverter Compressor,Dry Mode,Self- Diagnosis,Air Purification Filter,Dehumidifier,Dust Filter,Fast Cooling,Auto Clean,Turbo cooling,Remote Controlled.
- Colour: White.
- Control Console: Remote Control.
- Voltage: 230 Volts.
- Wattage: 1325 Watts.
- Compatible Devices: Personal Computer.
- Certification: energy star.
- Material: IDU: HIPS (High grade plastic) ; ODU: HDZP Steel Sheet.
- Batteries Included: No.
- Batteries Required: Yes.
- Battery Cell Type: Zinc.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Importer: Daikin airconditioning India Pvt.
- Ltd., 210, 1st Floor, Okhla Industrial Area, Phase 3, Delhi 110020.
- Item Weight: 44 kg.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 88.5 x 22.9 x 29.8 Centimeters.
- Net Quantity: 1 count.
- Generic Name: Split airconditioner.

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases an air conditioning product with a clean and modern layout. The background is diagonally split with a dual gradient — a deep navy-to-sky blue blend on the left and a light blue fade on the right — creating a dynamic atmosphere. The heading text layer (`heading`) is large and bold in white, conveying a strong message. The `subheading` beneath it uses a sleek sans-serif font in soft blue. The `description` layer lists product features in bullet format. The `price` is prominently displayed in large white numbers. The call-to-action, comprising the layers `cta_background` (yellow) and `cta` (blue text), includes a "SHOP NOW" button. Additional supporting text is in layer `tagline` above the product image (`product_image`), which shows the AC on the lighter background, enhancing visibility.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #0C3B5D  
- Royal Blue: #1976D2  
- Sky Blue: #A5D9FF  
- Light Blue: #EBF5FB  
- Warm Yellow: #FFD54F  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image uses a clean and modern color palette that conveys trust, innovation, and energy efficiency. The dominant colors include a crisp white (#FFFFFF) base for a sleek and hygienic appeal, vibrant blue (#007BFF) as a backdrop to emphasize cooling and technology, and a warm yellow (#FDD835) used in the information boxes to highlight key features for visibility and contrast. The colors are well-blended using gradient tones in the blue backdrop and consistent yellow highlights, which create a clear segmentation without overwhelming the design. This palette, paired with bold typography, makes the content readable and eye-catching in an advertisement banner.
